title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate uniform with conversion musket and small Bowie knife] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate uniform with conversion musket and small Bowie knife] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate ambrotype ; 7.4 x 6.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather; oval motif surrounded by scrolls. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Purchased from: Bryan Watson, Civil War Images, Torrington, Wyoming, 2011. Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army.--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Rifles--1860-1870. Knives--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.31456 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2699
